# Wilson Kumalo - Full Stack Software Engineer

Wilson Kumalo is a Full Stack Software Engineer, Flutter Developer, and AI & Digital Health Systems Builder. He specializes in designing and building scalable, secure, and impactful software systems ranging from mobile apps and web platforms to AI-powered and digital health solutions.

## Professional Summary
- **Role**: Full Stack Software Engineer
- **Specialties**: Mobile Apps (Flutter), Web Platforms, Backend Systems, AI-powered Solutions, Digital Health Systems.
- **Mission**: Solving real-world problems through technology with a focus on scalability and security.

## Key Projects

### FlySpotter Pro
An AI-powered mobile app for real-time fly species identification and tracking.
- **Stack**: Flutter, Firebase, TensorFlow Lite, Google Maps API.
- **Status**: Prototype with 90% model accuracy.

### CUT Portal WhatsApp Bot
A scalable WhatsApp chatbot providing university students access to portal information.
- **Stack**: Node.js, Express.js, WhatsApp Business API.
- **Impact**: Automates student services via a clean architecture approach.

### ZINWA Water Meter System
A prepaid water meter management solution featuring account management and real-time monitoring.
- **Stack**: Express.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Next.js, Flutter, IoT, Docker.
- **Features**: Paynow integration, JWT-based multi-role auth.

### LearnSmart AI Platform
Monorepo education platform with AI-powered features for personalized learning.
- **Stack**: Next.js, React, Redux, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, OpenAI API, Supabase.

### Smart Driver Companion
AI-enhanced Flutter app for driver behavior monitoring and community alerts.
- **Stack**: Flutter, Firebase, Google Maps, Python Flask.

## Core Expertise
- **Languages**: Dart, Java, TypeScript, JavaScript, PHP, Python, SQL.
- **Frameworks**: Flutter, Next.js, React, Express.js, Flask, Node.js.
- **Databases/Tools**: PostgreSQL, Redis, Supabase, Firebase, Docker, Git.
- **Specialized Fields**: AI/ML Integration (TensorFlow Lite, OpenAI), IoT, Digital Health, Web3/Geospatial.
